languages.text: "Двадцать плетей раз в месяц на ближайшие полгода. Лишение офицерского пайка и привилегий на тот же срок. С возможностью продления. Занесите в личное дело!"
"Twenty lashes a month for the next six months. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"
languages.original_text: "Двадцать плетей раз в месяц на ближайшие полгода. Лишение офицерского пайка и привилегий на тот же срок. С возможностью продления. Занесите в личное дело!"

traits.locale_text: "Twenty lashes a month for the next half-cycle. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"
"Twenty lashes a month for the next half-cycle. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"
"Twenty lashes a month for the next half-cycle. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"
"Twenty lashes a month for the next half-cycle. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"

languages.text: “在接下来的六个月，每个月鞭打二十下。惩处期可能会视情况延长。惩处期间，取消他的军官餐食与特权。这次惩处要入档案！”
languages.original_text: "Twenty lashes a month for the next six months. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"

traits.locale_text: “在接下来的半巡内，每个月鞭打二十下。惩处期可能会视情况延长。惩处期间，取消他的军官餐食与特权。这次惩处要入档案！”

languages.text: 「次の半年の間、月20回の鞭打ち。同期間、士官の糧食と特権を剥奪。延長も可能。彼のファイルに記録しておけ！」
languages.original_text: "Twenty lashes a month for the next six months. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"

traits.locale_text: 「次の半サイクルの間、月20回の鞭打ち。同期間、士官の糧食と特権を剥奪。延長も可能。彼のファイルに記録しておけ！」

languages.text: "Zwanzig Hiebe pro Monat für die nächsten sechs Monate. Gleichzeitig Entzug der Offiziersrationen und aller Privilegien. Verlängerung möglich. Schreibt das in seine Akte!"
languages.original_text: "Twenty lashes a month for the next six months. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"

traits.locale_text: "Zwanzig Hiebe pro Monat für den nächsten halben Zyklus. Gleichzeitig Entzug der Offiziersrationen und aller Privilegien. Verlängerung möglich. Schreibt das in seine Akte!"

languages.text: « Vingt coups de fouet par mois pendant les six prochain mois. Privation de ses rations et privilèges d'officier sur la même période. Châtiment reconductible si nécessaire. Notez tout ça dans son dossier ! »
languages.original_text: "Twenty lashes a month for the next six months. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"

traits.locale_text: « Vingt coups de fouet par mois pendant le prochain demi-cycle. Privation de ses rations et privilèges d'officier sur la même période. Châtiment reconductible si nécessaire. Notez tout ça dans son dossier ! »

languages.text: «Veinte latigazos al mes durante los próximos seis meses. Privación de raciones y privilegios de oficial durante el mismo período, con opción a extenderla. ¡Registradlo en su archivo!»
languages.original_text: "Twenty lashes a month for the next six months. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"

traits.locale_text: «Veinte latigazos al mes durante el próximo medio ciclo. Privación de raciones y privilegios de oficial durante el mismo período, con opción a extenderla. ¡Registradlo en su ficha!».

languages.text: "Önümüzdeki altı ay boyunca ayda yirmi kırbaç. Bu süreçte subaylık istihkak ve imtiyazlarından mahrum kalacak. Duruma göre cezası uzatılabilir. Siciline işlensin!"
languages.original_text: "Twenty lashes a month for the next six months. Deprivation of officer's rations and privileges for the same period. With the option to extend. Record that in his file!"

traits.locale_text: "Önümüzdeki altı ay boyunca ayda yirmi kırbaç. Bu süreçte subaylık istihkak ve imtiyazlarından mahrum kalacak. Duruma göre cezası uzatılabilir. Siciline işlensin!"
